column2: "Persiahen Sirus n'afe a otsia ebiasa no mu no
column3: wɔdaa asɛm bi edzi kyerɛɛ Daniel a ne dzin dze Bɛltesasar no; nna asɛm no yɛ nokwar
column4: na ɔfa ɔko kɛse ho na ne ntseasee yɛ dzen: naaso ɔtsee asɛm no ase
column5: na onyaa enyido adzehu no ho ntseasee."

column2: "Nda no mu no emi Daniel mo werɛ hoow adapɛn pɔr pɔr ebiasa."
"Menndzi edziban pa biara
column3: na nam anaa nsa annka m'ano
column5: dze kesii dɛ dapɛn pɔr pɔr ebiasa no soe."

column2: "Na bosoom a odzi kan no ne da a otsia eduonu anan no mu no
column3: ber a mowɔ esutsen a ɔyɛ Hidekel ho no
column6: na muhun banyin bi a ofura ndwera a Ufaz sika mapa bɔ n'asen wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Ne nyimpadua so tse dɛ sikabereebo
column5: na n'abasa na n'anan tse dɛ ayewa a wɔapɔw ho
column6: na ne kasaa ndze tse dɛ nyimpadodow ndze."

column2: "Na emi Daniel nko na muhun enyido adzehu no: na mbanyin a wɔka mo ho no ennhu enyido adzehu no; naaso ahopopo kɛsenara tɔɔ hɔn do
"Na ɔkaa mo nko a nna morohwɛ enyido adzehu kɛse yi
column3: na ahoɔdzen bi annka mo mu: na m'ahoɔfɛw daan prɔwee wɔ mo mu."

column2: "Naaso metsee ne ndze: na metsee n'asɛm no
column3: nna m'enyim butuw famu a matɔ nda heii."

column2: "Na
column4: nsa bi bosuoo mo mu a ɔmaa moweaweaa m'anankoroma enyim na me nsamu."

column2: "Na ɔsee me dɛ
column5: tsie asɛm a merebɛka akyerɛ wo yi na gyina tsentsen; na ɔwo na wɔasoma me wo nkyɛn yi: na ɔkaa asɛm yi kyerɛɛ me no

column2: "Nna ɔsee me dɛ
column4: mma nnsuro; na ofitsi da a odzi kan a edze w'akoma sii do dɛ ebɛtse asɛm no ase
column5: na abrɛ woho adze wɔ wo Nyankopɔn enyim no
column6: na wɔtsee wo nsɛm: na wo nsɛm ntsi na maba."

column2: "Na Persia ahenman safohen no siiw me kwan adapɛn ebiasa; na
column4: Maekɛl a ɔyɛ abɔfo etsitsir no mu baako no
column5: bae bɔboaa me: na mekaa hɔ wɔ Persia ahemfo no nkyɛn."

column2: "Afei maba dɛ merebɛma ehu dza ɔbɛba wo man do nda a odzi ekyir no mu: na enyido adzehu no da ho wɔ hɔ nda pii."
"Na ɔkaa nsɛm yi dɛm kyerɛɛ me no
"Na
column4: obi a ɔtse dɛ nyimpa ba saso bɛkaa m'anofamfa: nna mubuee m'ano kasaa kyerɛɛ nyia ogyina m'enyim no dɛ
column8: na minnyi ahoɔdzen bi wɔ mo mu."

column2: "Na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na mo wura n'akowaa yi nye mo wura bɛkasa? Na emi dze
column3: amonmu no ara ahoɔdzen biara annka mo mu
column4: eso ahom biara annka mo mu."

column2: "Nna obi a ɔtse dɛ nyimpa saso bɛkaa me bio
"Na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Ao nyimpa a wɔdɔ wo kɛse
column7: hyɛ dzen. Na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me no
column10: Ma mo wura nkasa; osiandɛ ɔwo ahyɛ me dzen."

column2: "Nna ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Ana inyim dza osian ntsi ma maba wo hɔ? Na afei na mebɛsan nye Persia safohen no akɔko: na misi mu kɔ a

column2: "Naaso mebɛka dza woekrukye no wɔ nokwar kyerɛwee mu no akyerɛ wo; na obi nnyi hɔ a osuo mo mu tsia yinom
